title: Tel Aviv University, Google Israel launch $1M AI research program
description: Tel Aviv University (TAU) and Google Israel have launched a new three-year program to advance research in core areas of artificial intelligence (AI). Google.org is providing USD 1 million in funding to support scholarships, research grants, and educational initiatives.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman believes ‘infinite memory’ matters more than smarter AI reasoning
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says the next major leap in artificial intelligence won’t come from better reasoning, but from AI systems that can remember users, preferences, and interactions over time.
content:
For those unfamiliar, ChatGPT’s Memory feature allows the AI chatbot to retain information shared across conversations, reducing the need for users to repeat the same details every time they start a new chat.
